title: How Sharon Horgan found a way to make the unexpected 'Bad Sisters' second season
content: The first season of 'Bad Sisters' was a complete story based off the Belgian limited-series, 'Clan'. After it's smash success, Sharon Horgan had a vision for how it could continue. The star-studded cast tells us how her vision came to fruition.
